column5: Had a blast down in Florida last week where I know another one off my bucket list, a Butterfly Peacock! Ended up catching a bunch of them and a new personal best! Beautiful fish who fight harder than a Smallmouth Bass! The colours are breathtaking on them and they're really not a bass but a Cichlid! If you're ever around Miami, I would definitely go catch a bunch!
Vey nice looking fish you got there. Glad you enjoyed them. Art
Way to go Dave, it looks like a nice spot too!
It’s actually at the back of my cousin’s house in Miami!
So your fuel millage was really good then to get to the honey hole from his place! Nice fish and congrats on a new PB
Wicked bars on that one fish looks like a giant perch. Nice fish.
Nice going Dave.  A golf course and peacocks, sounds like a hell of a back yard.  I heard you guys did well down there on the Harris chain - way to represent.
Very nice. I'd love to hook into one of those.  Aren't bass in the chiclid family though?
